md:
giải nghĩa từ "less" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Less (determiner, pronoun)
	+ Meaning: a smaller amount of something
	+ Example: I have less money than I had last year.
	+ Related words: fewer, little, few, a little, a few

* Less (adverb)
	+ Meaning: to a smaller extent or degree
	+ Example: I like coffee less than tea.
	+ Related words: less, lesser, least, more, most

* Less (preposition)
	+ Meaning: with a smaller amount of something
	+ Example: This cake is less sweet than the one we had yesterday.
	+ Related words: with, without, minus, except

Note: The meanings and examples are based on the Cambridge Dictionary.
html:

  • Less (determiner, pronoun)

    • Meaning: a smaller amount of something
    • Example: I have less money than I had last year.
    • Related words: fewer, little, few, a little, a few

  • Less (adverb)

    • Meaning: to a smaller extent or degree
    • Example: I like coffee less than tea.
    • Related words: less, lesser, least, more, most

  • Less (preposition)

    • Meaning: with a smaller amount of something
    • Example: This cake is less sweet than the one we had yesterday.
    • Related words: with, without, minus, except

Note: The meanings and examples are based on the Cambridge Dictionary.
